channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: State Capitalism in Private Markets: Mission Creep
item.description: Governments relish mingling in markets. Yet, if past policies are any guide, taxpayers are being shortchanged.

item.title: China President Xi's European charm offensive turns to trade and 'fair competition' as he meets with France's Macron
item.description: As France prepares to host the Summer Olympics, Macron said he would ask Xi to use his influence to make the Games “a diplomatic moment of peace.”

item.title: Implementation Shortfalls Hamstring Factor Strategies
item.description: Smart rebalancing rules help portfolio managers capture more of the return that is inherent in their factor strategies. Concentrating on “priority best” trading improves factor portfolio performance.

item.title: Democrats race to design ways to best use AI in 2024 campaign
item.description: The technology that could transform American elections — and perhaps threaten democracy itself.

item.title: IFRS Accounting Standard Will Support Better Investment Decisions
item.description: IFRS 18 responds to investors' concerns about challenges in comparing companies' financial performance.

item.title: 'The Fall Guy' posts weak $28.5 million opening, providing Hollywood a lukewarm start to the summer movie season
item.description: The modest start for “The Fall Guy” hints at larger concerns for the film industry.

item.title: Meir Statman: Your State of Mind Influences Your Investing Success
item.description: Meir Statman shares his insights on the broader aspects of financial well-being and its interconnection with life satisfaction.

item.title: Former Trump campaign manager who used Cambridge Analytica to target Facebook ads in 2016 run has returned with his own AI platform
item.description: Brad Parscale, the digital campaign operative who helped engineer Trump’s 2016 presidential victory, vows that his new, AI-powered platform will dramatically overhaul not just polling, but campaigning.

item.title: Book Review: Trailblazers, Heroes, and Crooks
item.description: Stephen Foerster, CFA, extracts lessons from exceptional episodes in financial history that ordinary investors and seasoned professionals alike can put to profitable use. The bonus is that you'll be entertained from start to finish.

item.title: Starbucks ex-CEO Howard Schultz says chain needs a major fix after biggest sales miss in years: 'There must be contrition'
item.description: Shares plummeted after sales dropped this month for the first time since the early days of Covid in 2020.
